title: The realization that Smite mid is back.
body:
So after looking at the new Jungle item closer i just realized how stupid this is going to become.

Luden's Echo: 100 AP, 10% movespeed, 3.2k Gold, 100+10% AP scaling
Runic Echoes: 60 AP, 10% movespeed, 2.6k gold, 80+10% AP scaling, Smite ability upgrade (most likely red) and 18% missing mana if you decide to hit a jungle camp

Who's ready to see smite mid again?

replies.body: I am but I'm not sure there are many sides to this as why would I take any of those over frost queens claim which I think also does similar to them and gives me to ghost to scout an area about 2K area around me and if it finds anyone slows them by about 30%.

FQC got nerfed, and this is just a massive ass one item power spike like the old runeglaive back during the times of smite mid.

Except this is good on most mid laners (Cause a Luden's substitute is better than a Lichbane substitute).
Honestly i doubt it will be an Ez mid thing because of the fact that it's a Luden's Substitute and that's not what ezreal want's normally.
but when the old jungle item was out, it was good on him since it gave multi-target damage, which is what this new item kinda gives, giving more waveclear to his kit.
